posts.postText: Can we change the music of the radio the old one pls?
I have no idea why Bird Flu decided to change it from the disco song to a depressing song from Half Life 2.  Also, once the server is switched, can the ravebreak mod be re installed?
For the longest time I had thought that Bird Flu was actually online whenever that played, when i found out it was the new radio I saw severely disappointed. I like Ravebreak more.
Radio was switched because the music couldn't be downloaded or something, which means that all new players couldn't hear the radio when it was used so the music had to be switched :l
Then ravebreak.mp3 should have been re-added to the download list when we switched servers.
